column1: Hormonal effects in newborns occur because in the womb babies are exposed to many chemicals (hormones) that are in the mother's bloodstream.
This causes breast enlargement in the mother.
By the third day after birth, breast swelling may also be seen in newborn boys and girls.
Such newborn breast swelling does not last, but it is a common concern among new parents.
- There may also be a small amount of bleeding from the vagina.
